parameters.name: Peripheral
parameters.description: True if a peripheral weld, false if not

title: IWeldSymbol.SetPeripheral
description: Sets the peripheral property of this weld symbol.

parameters.name: Peripheral
parameters.description: True if a peripheral weld, false if not

returns: True if the peripheral weld setting is set successfully, false if not
remarks:
To retrieve the peripheral property of a weld symbol, use
IWeldSymbol::GetPeripheral
.
